discussion_comments.comment_body: `SUB_DIR` 指向代码仓库中 `docker-compose/local`。值由 Lobe 仓库地址或 `––url` 参数拼接而来，如果需要在上述路径从代码仓库中下载配置文件，务必用 `SUB_DIR` 进行拼接。

discussion_comments.comment_body:
sure
will change to this:
`if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then
    # macOS
    SED_COMMAND="sed -i ''"
else
    SED_COMMAND="sed -i"`
    
change nothing in other systems

Consider add this command on PR description to help other reviewer to test script on your branch?

```sh
bash <(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wbean/lobe-chat/patch-1/docker-compose/local/setup.sh) -f -l zh_CN --url https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wbean/lobe-chat/patch-1
```
